actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to prohibit travel at Government expense outside the United States by Members of Congress who have been defeated, or who have resigned, or retired.

summary.text: Prohibits travel at Government expense outside the United States by Members of Congress, Delegates, or Resident Commissioners who have been defeated, or who have resigned, or retired.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit travel at Government expense outside the United States by Members of Congress who have been defeated, or who have resigned, or retired.
